title: The Isolation of X
description: A brilliant artist losing his talent and battling invisibility, a self-help guru that can't stand up to her own mother, a telepathic plastic surgeon, time travel, true love, good vs evil, pop-culture and a pit-bull that loves comedies. The Isolation of X is the debut novel by author Lyra Jade Acajou and follows the lives of several characters navigating their way through bizarre circumstances to find out who and what they really are and who or what stands between them and the lives of their dreams.
author: Lyra Jade Acajou
